title: Jenny Loves Yoga
description: Jenny Loves Yoga is about Jenny and the different yoga poses she does each day to help her grow strong, flexible, and healthy. This introductory text touches on some of the reasons people practice yoga. Photographs show Jenny doing a variety of yoga poses.
meta: balancing, inversion, meditation, pose, salutation, yoga
